#labels Featured
= *iRINGTools* 1.2.1.840 =

A bug fix release of iRINGTools 1.2 that also includes RDF output and speed improvements.  The download is available [http://iring-tools.googlecode.com/files/iRINGTools-121.zip here]

[http://iring-tools.googlecode.com/files/iRINGTools_Installation_Guide_v1.2.0.pdf Installation Guide]

== Bugs Fixed ==
 * Issue 52	In MappingEditor class roles are not identified if more than one level of superclassing is used
 * Issue 2	Only certain tree nodes are cached
 * Issue 75	Error on Pull when identifier has null value
 * Issue 26	Mapping Editor to handle variable safe names
 * Issue 45	Repository Information not displayed on detail pane
 * Issue 29	Entity type of a class needs to be resolved into label
 * Issue 19	NHibernate works with generator class as assigned.
 * Issue 17	PostList doesn't work because of problem in GetDataObject.
 * Issue 60	SPARQL generation does not handle mapping changes.


== New Features ==
 * Issue 22	Improve refreshing triple store performance
  * XSLT-based RDF generation
  * RDF output via .../rdf
 * Version resource (/version)

== Known Bugs ==
  * PullDTO is not working.
  * RefDataService cannot write to SemWeb SandboxService, but still works with Joseki SandboxService.
